svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 29, 2024" date: "2024-06-29"
Eth News and Links
SEC charges Consensys, US Supreme Court overrules Chevron deference and Reth
(Paradigmâ€™s Rust execution layer client) is production ready
All core devs
* All core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) #136 : Presentation on private sharing of client
info by validators research PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other
execution layer clients statelessly (before Verkle) and change engine API encoding from
JSON to SSZ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution
layer clients EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit
processing EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients,
discussion on decoupling layers for blob count EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet
running but not all clients have implemented, no decision yet on including in Electra
* Presentation on private sharing of client info by validators research
Presentation on private sharing of client info by validators research
* PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other execution layer clients
statelessly (before Verkle) and change engine API encoding from JSON to SSZ
PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other execution layer clients
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer
clients EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing
EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients, discussion
on decoupling layers for blob count EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but
not all clients have implemented, no decision yet on including in Electra
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
* pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients
pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients
* EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing
* EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients,
discussion on decoupling layers for blob count
on decoupling layers for blob count
* EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have implemented, no
decision yet on including in Electra
EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have implemented, no
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
* Future of EOA/AA breakout #5 : EIP7702 delegation designation proposal to be merged
next week
Future of EOA/AA breakout #5 : EIP7702 delegation designation proposal to be merged
* PeerDAS breakout #2 : passing max blobs per block is preferred solution for
decoupling layers, value should be configurable and fetching from execution layer pool
experiment
PeerDAS breakout #2 : passing max blobs per block is preferred solution for decoupling
layers, value should be configurable and fetching from execution layer pool experiment
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.2% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.2% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62% Consensus layer: Prysm
38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
* Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62%
Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62%
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Geographic distribution of validators , estimated using p2p data
Geographic distribution of validators , estimated using p2p data
Layer 1
* Gossipsub performance , recommends reducing concurrent IWANT messages sent & lowering
heartbeat frequency
Gossipsub performance , recommends reducing concurrent IWANT messages sent & lowering
* EF Protocol Security Research team explainer of what they do
EF Protocol Security Research team explainer of what they do
Research
* Orbit SSF : solo-staking-friendly validator set management for single slot finality
Orbit SSF : solo-staking-friendly validator set management for single slot finality
* Execution Auctions superior to Execution Tickets , simpler to implement but have
centralization concerns (which may be curbed by Inclusion Lists)
Execution Auctions superior to Execution Tickets , simpler to implement but have
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill Nimbus v24.6.0 :
SHA256 hashing 30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing improperly
configured, adds block scoring and enables block monitoring by default
Consensus layer:
* Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill
Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill
* Nimbus v24.6.0 : SHA256 hashing 30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing
improperly configured, adds block scoring and enables block monitoring by default
Nimbus v24.6.0 : SHA256 hashing 30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing
* Execution layer: Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync
from genesis in ~50 hours, 2.3TB archive node
Execution layer:
* Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes
Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes
* Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync from genesis in ~50 hours, 2.3TB archive
node
Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync from genesis in ~50 hours, 2.3TB archive
Layer 2
* Arbitrum Timeboost proposed, auction for express transaction submission (non-express
transactions have a short delay), proceeds will either be in ARB (burnt) or ETH
(collected)
Arbitrum Timeboost proposed, auction for express transaction submission (non-express
* Flashbots: MEV on L2s
Flashbots: MEV on L2s
* Offchain Labs BlobWatcher : monitor transaction pool for blob transactions
Offchain Labs BlobWatcher : monitor transaction pool for blob transactions
* Blast phase 1 airdrop, goes in at $2B FDV
Blast phase 1 airdrop, goes in at $2B FDV
* L2Beat ZK Catalog : code verification of onchain ZK verifiers
L2Beat ZK Catalog : code verification of onchain ZK verifiers
For Stakers
* Stakesaurus: DVT home staking guide (Diva), aimed at novices
Stakesaurus: DVT home staking guide (Diva), aimed at novices
* Ethereum on ARM : full node (Geth + Nimbus) on Rock 5B 16 GB RAM with 2 physical
cores
Ethereum on ARM : full node (Geth + Nimbus) on Rock 5B 16 GB RAM with 2 physical cores
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7727 : EVM transaction bundles
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7727 : EVM transaction bundles
* RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7728 : Precompile for L1SLOAD
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
* RIP7728 : Precompile for L1SLOAD
* ERCs (application layer standards): ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension)
ERC7730 : Structured data clear signing format
ERCs (application layer standards):
* ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension)
ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension)
* ERC7730 : Structured data clear signing format
Stuff for developers
* Snekmate v0.1 (Vyper contracts): contracts made module friendly, targets Vyper v0.4.0
Snekmate v0.1 (Vyper contracts): contracts made module friendly, targets Vyper v0.4.0
* Remix v0.51 : adds SolidityScan to analyze code for vulnerabilities and supports
EIP712 eth_signTypedData in Remix VM
Remix v0.51 : adds SolidityScan to analyze code for vulnerabilities and supports EIP712
eth_signTypedData in Remix VM
* Patrick Collins: guide to where EVM can read/write data
Patrick Collins: guide to where EVM can read/write data
* Gas playground : browser playground for Solidity contracts, uses live state
(currently Base only)
Gas playground : browser playground for Solidity contracts, uses live state (currently
Base only)
* Guide to mine an efficient address using create2crunch
Guide to mine an efficient address using create2crunch
* EVMole v0.3.5 (function selector extractor): adds Vyper support
EVMole v0.3.5 (function selector extractor): adds Vyper support
* Viem experimental adds Solady ERC1271 Actions
Viem experimental adds Solady ERC1271 Actions
* Paradigm fellowship technical questions
Paradigm fellowship technical questions
* RareSkills Uniswap v2 puzzles
RareSkills Uniswap v2 puzzles
* Cyfrin updraft : updated Solidity & Foundry courses
Cyfrin updraft : updated Solidity & Foundry courses
Ecosystem
* EF Next Billion cohort 4 fellows
EF Next Billion cohort 4 fellows
* ETHKyiv hackathon projects
ETHKyiv hackathon projects
Enterprise
* Stripe adding Base support to their crypto payouts & onramp
Job Listings
* Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator
Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator
* IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
* Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
* Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Senior Content
Marketing & Senior Marketing Manager
Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Senior Content
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 23.5 gwei 13k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
* 13k ETH net issuance this week
13k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $3,259 - $3,516, currently $3,385, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,259 - $3,516, currently $3,385, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Regulation/business/tokens
* SEC charges Consensys as an unregistered broker for MetaMask Swaps and claims
MetaMask Staking sells securities (stETH & rETH)
SEC charges Consensys as an unregistered broker for MetaMask Swaps and claims MetaMask
Staking sells securities (stETH & rETH)
* US Supreme Court: holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo
courts overrules Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
US Supreme Court:
* holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo courts
holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo courts
* overrules Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
overrules Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
* Coinbase filed FOIA lawsuits against SEC & FDIC over Bidenâ€™s Operation Chokepoint 2.0
Coinbase filed FOIA lawsuits against SEC & FDIC over Bidenâ€™s Operation Chokepoint 2.0
* US Treasury finalized broker rule , but punts on DeFi
US Treasury finalized broker rule , but punts on DeFi
General
* Iranians vote : scan passport NFC to prove eligibility, generate ZK proof & vote on
Gnosis chain
Iranians vote : scan passport NFC to prove eligibility, generate ZK proof & vote on
* Polyfill (JavaScript) supply chain attack, Cloudflare automatically replacing links
Polyfill (JavaScript) supply chain attack, Cloudflare automatically replacing links
* Wired: home invader convicted of burglarizing & torture to steal crypto
Wired: home invader convicted of burglarizing & torture to steal crypto
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-29-2024
